name: Crabvania - Prototype
description:
Hello and welcome to Crabvania, where you plunge into the depths of the ocean and watch as the world around you becomes more and more degenerate (it's kind of like growing up)! 

Crabvania is a casual 2D adventure game that tries to be Metroidvania, and you can play it by your lonesome or watch as your buddy plays it as you crack open a cold one, or tell your little brother that you'll give him the controls later but you never will because he's probably too young to see the depravity of the dev team (Pegi-12). You'll understand once you play the game. 

You play as a cute little crab that can switch shells, jump from platform to platform, defy the laws of nature by burning underwater seaweed, and ABSOLUTELY ANNIHILATE ITS ENEMIES. And more! 

Ever wondered what it's like "unda da sea" after the world has gone to shit? Time to find out!
